alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A line of strong showers will impact portions of northwestern Franklin and central St. Lawrence Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong showers near Heuvelton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Isolated power outages are possible. Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Massena, Gouverneur, Canton, Ogdensburg, Norfolk, Lisbon, Louisville, De Kalb, Fowler, Parishville, Colton, Morley, Massena International Airport - Richards Field, Helena, Waddington, Richville, Madrid, Lawrenceville and Rensselaer Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence
